</user_query>"}]},{"role":"assistant","content":[{"type":"thinking","thinking":"The error message indicates that there's an issue with parsing the XML file at `/Users/sanskarpal/AndroidStudioProjects/MovieApp2/app/build/intermediates/packaged_res/debug/packageDebugResources/layout/movie_list_item.xml`. 

The specific error is: `Attribute "android:layout_width" was already specified for element "LinearLayout"`.

This means in the `movie_list_item.xml` layout file, there's a `LinearLayout` that has the `android:layout_width` attribute defined twice. This is causing the build to fail because XML doesn't allow duplicate attributes.

 android:layout_width="match_parent"

 android:id="@+id/ivMovie"

I found the issue. The `layout` root element has attributes `android:layout_width` and `android:layout_height` which are not valid there. These attributes are meant only for view elements inside a layout, not for the layout tag itself.

Let me fix the file by removing these invalid attributes from the root layout element:"}],"tool_calls":[{"id":"toolu_bdrk_016PHm12U63B9pSNu7syj9p8","type":"function","function":{"name":"edit_file","arguments":"{"target_file": "app/src/main/res/layout/movie_list_item.xml", "instructions": "I will remove the invalid android:layout_width and android:layout_height attributes from the root layout element.", "code_edit": "@@ ... @@\n<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"utf-8\"?>\n<layout xmlns:android=\"http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android\"\n xmlns:app=\"http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto\"\n xmlns:bind=\"http://schemas.android.com/tools\">\n\n <data>\n <variable\n name=\"movie\"\n type=\"com.example.movieapp.model.Movie\" />\n </data>\n\n <LinearLayout\n android:layout_width=\"match_parent\"\n android:layout_height=\"wrap_content\"\n android:orientation=\"vertical\">"}"}}]},{"role":"tool","name":"edit_file","tool_call_id":"toolu_bdrk_016PHm12U63B9pSNu7syj9p8","content":"The apply model made the following changes to the file:

The edit was successful with no linter errors."},{"role":"assistant","content":[{"type":"text","text":"

Now try building your project again. I removed the invalid layout attributes (`android:layout_width` and `android:layout_height`) from the root `<layout>` element, which was causing the error. 

The error occurred because these layout attributes were being applied both to the root `<layout>` tag and to the `<LinearLayout>` inside it, creating a duplicate attribute situation during XML processing.

In Android's data binding layouts, the `<layout>` tag is just a container for the data binding information and the actual layout - it should not have layout attributes like width and height."}]}]}
